reviewText: My daughter loved watching and learning! It is a little outdated but it really does a great job teaching letters and sounds

Babies LOVE Ms Becky & her friends!  I used this to 'brainwash' my babies, and they're smart and getting ready for college.  I kept giving them shows like this to keep their education going.  the next thing to hook them on after this is 'between the lions'  excellent stuff!!!
I was skeptical of the condition since it was used - but it's in good condition.

When my kids were little I used this program and we loved it.  I can't say enough good things about.  I'd suggest buying the whole program with all the videos and books. With Challenger Way and the Sing Spell Read & Write program my kids could read and write before they were in kindergarten.  I'm now using it with my grandchildren.
